data.title: Good Prices and Good Food
data.text: If you want a decent pizza to eat, then this place is for you. Politos pizza is very nice and you get your food really quick. They have many choices of pizza to fit everyone's needs. Overall, very good!

data.title: Good slice o'pizza
data.text: The pizza is good, but if you go when they're not as busy, it may not be as fresh. But that goes for any place that has food sitting out under heat lamps. Love the different varieties they offer. They also have a HUGE pizza they sell, it's massive! My friend ordered one for their baby shower. It was good!

data.title: Great selections of pizzas
data.text: I've been in twice this spring. Very quick. Pizzas are done, huge slices, and you choose what you want and they heat it up. Big, sturdy boxes are used, and you can ask for the pepper flakes and parm cheese packages, napkins. Easy parking right outside, lots of seating inside if you choose to eat in. Love the pizza, crust, toppings, everything. Crust is good, not sure if its thick, but nice and chewy. But not too chewy, and not at all dry. Just right. Try it, you'll like it, for sure.

data.title: Worth Trying at least Once
data.text: Polito's has great variety and options for either buying a whole pizza or just a single slice (and those slices are HUGE!). Might as well go by and try it out. You can get a slice of cheese pizza for $2.50, one topping $2.75, or speciality $3.25. Their menu is also available online if you want to scope out all the prices before going, which is super convenient!

data.title: average- but they do sell pizza by the slice
data.text: There pizza is average. It really doesn't stand out. It is one of the few places in Oshkosh to sell pizza by the slice. It's located near the university, and it's a place where I think you will find some college kids. I think some people like this place because it's inexpensive. I sometimes eat here when we're doing something near the university.

data.title: Pizza by the slice!
data.text: The best place I've been to around these parts where I can buy pizza by the slice! They have a lunch special also. It's always busy on the weekends and especially around bar close. Being right on a college campus, that's mostly the crowd you'll see eating there. DO NOT BE DISCOURAGED! It's delicious pie!

data.title: Best Pizza in Oshkosh!  Can't get enough.
data.text: This is definitely my whole family's favorite pizza in the Oshkosh area.  Any time we decide on pizza it is always Politos.  Great choice for a single slice or whole pie.

data.title: try the mac and cheese pizza
data.text: I have yet to be disappointed by Polito's and we have ordered take out from there a couple times.  The mac and cheese pizza is fabulous (very cheesy!).  Friendly, quick service.  This is our 'go-to' take out!

data.title: Excellent Pizza...for Delivery.  Not eat-in.
data.text: Awesome pizza, reasonable prices.  However the dining room is 40 below zero with ceiling fans blowing on high all the time.  They frequently run out of Garlic Knots too.  530pm on Sunday, all sold out.

data.title: Best. Pizza. In. Wisconsin.
data.text: Title says it all.  They make you submit 100 characters in a review.  But the title should be enough.   Nuff said

data.title: Pizza by the slice, better fresh
data.text:
Polito's pizza is great. They have many different slices to choose from (all NY Style large slice), and I have never been disappointed. The garlic knots combo is a great deal, and on Monday and Tuesday they have a great deal on 2 slices. The pizza by the slice can be a little underwhelming (crust tends to get a little too hard for me) but their fresh pizza is nearly perfect. Everything on the menu is good, and the specialty pizzas are all fun to try. Went here all of the time when I lived up the road.

I would be wary of going late at night (around bar time), as this is a VERY popular destination for much of the campus bar crowd. Go during the day or in the early evening to miss the shenanigans of bar close.
